alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake; City of Hampton; City of Norfolk; City of Poquoson; City of Portsmouth; City of Virginia Beach; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 09 at 5:01PM EDT until July 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 466 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EASTERN VIRGINIA NORTHAMPTON IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BOWERS HILL, CAPE CHARLES, CAPE COLONY, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, EXMORE, FENTRESS, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBRIER, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HORSESHOE, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MOUNT PLEASANT, NORFOLK, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, VALHALLA, AND VIRGINIA BEACH.
